source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_00<tab>Alka Zolka fusses over Setoto.

TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_01<tab>As Setoto appears to be fully recovered, Alka Zolka would like to begin the search for a memento of her father. The Royal Marine suggests beginning at Amdapor Keep. If, as you have come to suspect, Setoto's father was captured by the Amdapori while on a mission to discover a way to reverse the Nymian plague, he would have been transported to Amdapor Keep for questioning. It is then likely that some of his remaining possessions can be found there. Make your way to the ancient ruins and look for any items which Setoto might remember her father by.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_01<tab>Setoto hat sich von ihren Wunden erholt, so dass ihr beschließt, eure Suche nach einer Spur ihres Vaters aufzunehmen. Triff dich an den Ruinen von Amdapor mit Alka Zolka.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_02<tab>The three of you pick your way through Amdapor Keep, and you encounter various denizens of the ruins and ancient artifacts─including an Amdapori journal which touches upon taking a Nymian spy captive. From it you are able to conclude that Setoto's father's personal effects have been stored in a mana idol. As you begin dismantling these Amdapori golems, you are confronted by a manasnatcher, one of the hulking creatures that resides there. After a hard-fought battle, it falls lifeless to the ground, and a coffer tumbles from its innards. You, Alka, and Setoto move to open it.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_02<tab>In den Ruinen werdet ihr tatsächlich fündig. Sprich im Südwald mit Alka Zolka.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_03<tab>You open it to see that it contains what appears to be Setoto's father's grimoire, clothes, and soul crystal. Gingerly taking the crystal in her hands, Setoto begs her father's faerie, Lilac, to appear. It unleashes a sphere of purple light and Setoto falls to the ground, unconscious. After an unsuccessful attempt to wake her, Alka Zolka bids you help him transport the tonberry out of the dangerous ruins and to Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_03<tab>Unter den Habseligkeiten von Setotos Vater befindet sich auch dessen Jobkristall. Als Setoto versucht, die Familienfee zu rufen, verliert sie jedoch die Besinnung. Ihr schnappt euch die Lalafell in Tomberry-Gestalt und bringt sie nach Camp Seelenruhe.

source:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_04<tab>You and Alka return to Camp Tranquil with Setoto, and the marauder asks that you use your knowledge to diagnose what is wrong with her. You conclude that, despite the lack of physical injuries, it will be a while before the young tonberry girl wakes. Alka is deeply troubled by the news, and his panicked shouts draw the attention of Landenel of the Wood Wailers, who offers to take Setoto into his care until such a time she has recovered. Requesting that you remain behind with her and Landenel, Alka Zolka leaves you for Bronze Lake to speak with Surito Carito.

※The next scholar quest will be available from Alka Zolka upon reaching level 68.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_04<tab>Landenel vom Klageregiment erklärt sich auf höchst charmante Weise bereit, auf Setoto aufzupassen. Während Alka Zolka Surito Carito auf den neuesten Stand bringt, bleibt dir nichts anderes übrig, als auf eine Besserung von Setotos Zustand zu warten.

※ Sobald du als Gelehrte<var 08 E905 (()) ((r)) /var> (Hermetiker<var 08 E905 ((in)) (()) /var>) Stufe 68 erreicht hast, kannst du von Alka Zolka in Camp Seelenruhe den nächsten Auftrag erhalten.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_05<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_06<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_10<tab>

TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Alka Zolka near Amdapor Keep.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_00<tab>Alka Zolka an den Ruinen von Amdapor treffen

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_01<tab>Rendezvous with Alka Zolka near Amdapor Keep.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_01<tab>Mit Alka Zolka vor den Ruinen von Amdapor sprechen

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alka Zolka at Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_02<tab>Alka Zolka nach Camp Seelenruhe folgen

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_03<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_04<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_001<tab>Setoto! You appear to be doing much better. Even your complexion has returned to normal.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_001<tab>Du scheinst dich ja gut erholt zu haben, Setoto. Hast gar nicht mehr so ein blasses Gesicht wie noch vor ein paar Tagen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_002<tab>Indeed! I, too, noticed that my skin once again glows a healthy shade of green!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_002<tab>Wie aufmerksam von dir, Alka Zolka. Ich fand bei einem Blick in den Spiegel heute Morgen auch, dass mein Teint ein viel kräftigeres Grün angenommen hat.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, now that Setoto has recovered, our search can begin. Ere we depart, let us quickly review what we know.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab>Ausgezeichnet, dann kann unsere Expedition ja losgehen! Bevor wir aufbrechen, sollten wir allerdings erst mal zusammenfassen, was wir bislang so wissen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>Setoto's father was a scholar in the Royal Marines who had been dispatched on a mission to infiltrate Amdapor. He was to return with a cure to the disease that threatened to engulf Nym─only, he never did.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>Dein Vater war also Gelehrter bei den Nymer Seesoldaten, richtig? In dieser Funktion wurde er auf eine geheime Mission nach Amdapor geschickt, kam aber nie zurück.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Yes. I am almost certain he was caught, captured, and then killed by the Amdapori...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Ja. Vermutlich haben ihn die Wachen erwischt und gefangen genommen ... oder getötet.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_006<tab>Even if that was not the case, after fifteen hundred years, we can safely assume he is no longer alive. I hold out hope, however, that some of his belongings remain.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_006<tab>Wie auch immer, am Leben wäre er sowieso nicht mehr. Es würde mir ja schon reichen, nur irgendein Andenken an ihn zu finden.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>The Amdapori were extremely dedicated to expanding their knowledge of healing magic. Anything in a scholar's possession would have been of incredible value to them, and had your father been captured, they would have confiscated all that he had.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>Die Habseligkeiten eines Nymer Gelehrten waren für die Herren von Amdapor, die ja schließlich an Heilmagie forschten, sicher von großem Interesse. Bestimmt hat man sie an einem sicheren Ort verwahrt.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>He would then likely have been transported to a remote and secure location for interrogation. That means...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>Außerdem ist ihnen vermutlich nicht jeden Tag einer ihrer Erzfeinde in die Arme gelaufen. Man wird ihn vernommen haben, und zwar an einem möglichst ausbruchssicheren Ort.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab>Our chances of finding anything that once belonged to him will be highest in Amdapor Keep.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab>Ich denke, wir sollten unser Glück mal in den Ruinen von Amdapor versuchen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_010<tab>Oh, Alka, not only are you terribly kind, but you are keen of mind, as well!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_010<tab>Ach, Alka! Du bist nicht nur sehr nett, sondern auch äußerst schlau!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_011<tab>Ahem. Thank you. Now, in the final years of the War of the Magi, Amdapor was demolished by the Mhachi. It was overrun with a myriad of voidsent beasts that linger to this day.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_011<tab>Seit die Mhacher dort am Ende des Krieges der Magi einfielen, steckt das Gemäuer voller Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ter.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_012<tab>As we forge forward, you must be sure to keep your wits about you! Amdapor Keep is fraught with dangers both known and unknown.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_012<tab>Es wird sicher kein Spaziergang, aber wir schaffen das schon! Also, auf zu den Ruinen von Amdapor!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_015<tab>For so long I've been treated like a hideous beast that I'd forgotten what it was like to be thought of as a girl. Alka has reminded me, and for that, I cannot thank him enough.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_015<tab>Ich habe mich längst damit abgefunden, wie ein Monster behandelt zu werden. Es tut gut, zur Abwechslung auch mal wieder eine Frau sein zu dürfen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_100_020<tab>We've finally made it! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, if you're ready, please lead the way.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_100_020<tab>Da bist du ja endlich, <var 08 E905 ((Partnerin)) ((Partner)) /var>. Jetzt darfst du Schnüffeltalent beweisen. Folgen wir den Spuren von Setotos Vater!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_020<tab>So this is Amdapor Keep...erstwhile home to the mages we fought so long and hard against.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SETOTO_000_020<tab>Das sind also die Reste der Festung unserer einstigen Gegner ...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Find Setoto a memento of her father!
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Defeat the manasnatcher!
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_10<tab>The Presence Chamber... From here we must tread with caution. We know not what dangers lurk in the shadows.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_10<tab>Willkommen in den Ruinen von Amdapor!
Nehmt euch vor den Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>ten in Acht!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_10<tab>Whatever happens, I shall not leave this place without something to remember my father by.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_10<tab>Hoffentlich finde ich hier etwas von meinem Vater.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_01<tab><gasp> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This log─I think it's about my late father...
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_02<tab>(-Tattered Log-)The interrogation of the Nymian spy we apprehended is scheduled to soon take place at the Moot Hall.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_02<tab>(-Gefangenenprotokoll-)Die Ratte aus Nym, die sich gestern bei uns einschleichen wollte, wird gerade in der Versammlungshalle verhört.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_03<tab>(-Tattered Log-)The healing powers his people wield are not like to those of white magic. Regardless of what it takes, we must find a way to determine the mysterious source of his power.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_03<tab>(-Gefangenenprotokoll-)Wir müssen unbedingt herausfinden, wie sich ihre Heilmagie von der weißen Magie unterscheidet.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_04<tab>(-Tattered Log-)We suspect his robes are crucial to his spellcasting. They will no doubt hold some of the answers.
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_05<tab>(-Tattered Log-)For now, however, we will be sealing them away in one of our mana idols.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SYSTEM_05<tab>(-Gefangenenprotokoll-)Sie werden bis auf Weiteres in einem Totem verwahrt.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>Then we must begin dismantling the mana idols!
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_101_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>One of them might be carrying Setoto's father's things!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_101_ALKAZOLKA_05<tab>Na, dann wissen wir ja jetzt, wem wir was auf die Mütze geben müssen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_11<tab>Rubbish, nothing more...
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_06<tab>All the pages are in tatters. Perhaps we'll have better luck with the next one we find.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_06<tab>Die Seiten sind unlesbar. Lasst uns weitersuchen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_07<tab>Nothing in this bag looks as though it could have belonged to him...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_07<tab>Hier ist nichts, was auf meinen Vater hinweist.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_11<tab><cough> <cough> The stench... It's worse than that of spoiled milk!
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_08<tab>This book appears to─
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_08<tab>Ich kann hier keinen Hinweis auf Setotos Vater finden.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_17<tab><grunt> Wh-What's this? My body tingles from head to toe and suddenly I feel so light! It must be charmed!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_17<tab>Ich fühle mich auf einmal so leicht! War das ein Zauberbuch?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_16<tab>This chest is full to the brim with treasure!
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_12<tab>No. This isn't what we're looking for. Let us leave it.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_12<tab>Ich glaube nicht, dass das von meinem Vater ist. Lassen wir es liegen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_12<tab>Why are there so many broken mana─ Great gods! That beast! Over there!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_12<tab>Die Totems sind alle zerstört!
War das dieser Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>te?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_13<tab>He's spotted us! We have no choice but to fight him.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_13<tab>So können wir das richtige Totem nicht finden!
Der Nichts<var 16 /var>gesand<var 16 /var>te muss verschwinden!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_14<tab>Is...is that a coffer!? This thing must have been feeding on the mana idols!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_14<tab>Eine Schatztruhe?
Die hat er wohl mitsamt eines Totems verschluckt.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_15<tab>Setoto, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Perhaps this is it...
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_ALKAZOLKA_DEAD<tab>Seven hells! We're done for...
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_DEAD<tab>Father...forgive me...
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_QIB_001_SETOTO_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_000<tab>Look! It's a Nymian grimoire!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_000<tab>He! Dieses Buch stammt aus Nym! Setoto?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_001<tab>I recognize this! It's my father's! And these...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_001<tab>Ja, das ist von meinem Vater. Zweifellos! Dann gibt es hier bestimmt noch mehr!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_002<tab>These are his robes! Th-They're from the day he left. All of it has been so perfectly preserved, it's almost as though he were wearing them but yesterday...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_002<tab>Seine Kleidung! Wie gut sie erhalten ist!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_003<tab>Oh? What's this?
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>...Is that his <var 1A 02 /var>soul crystal<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>Ist das etwa der Jobkristall deines Vaters?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_005<tab>Yes...and within slumbers the faerie that has been with my family for generations.

TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_006<tab>I thought I had lost nearly everyone to that godsforsaken war and the terrible disease that followed... Yet, in spite of all odds, here she is─the last of my family, sitting right in the palm of my hand. I would give anything to see her again.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_006<tab>Durch den Krieg der Magi und die Tomberry-Krankheit habe ich alle meine Verwandten verloren. Diese Fee ist das einzige, was mir an Familie noch bleibt. Ob ... sie noch lebt?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_007<tab>Lilac...? Lilac, please... Answer me!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_SETOTO_000_007<tab>Wenn du mich hörst, dann zeig dich bitte, Lyla!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>Setoto? <var 1A 02 /var>Setoto<var 1A 01 /var>!? What happened? Wake up!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_008<tab>Setoto! Was ist passiert? So sag doch was!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, something's wrong! She's not responding. We must get her back to Camp Tranquil immediately!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_NCUT_ALKAZOLKA_000_009<tab>Fass mal mit an, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Sie muss zurück nach Camp Seelenruhe! Sofort!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're a Royal Marine and an outstanding scholar, besides. Surely, you can diagnose what's wrong with her?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Als <var 08 E905 ((die einzige Gelehrte)) ((der einzige Gelehrte)) /var> der neuen Seesoldaten kannst nur du Setoto helfen! Ich flehe dich an! Heile sie!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Setoto has no external injuries, and both her breathing and pulse are stable. Despite this, she appears to have slipped into a coma from which she will not wake any time soon.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Setoto hat keine sichtbaren Wunden und auch ihr Puls und ihre Atmung sind ruhig. Trotzdem macht sie keine Anzeichen, aus ihrer Ohnmacht zu erwachen.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_052<tab>She won't be waking any time soon!? No, that can't be! What in the seven hells happened back there!?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_052<tab>Wie ... Wie kann das sein? Was ist ihr bloß zugestoßen?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_053<tab>Troubled civilians in need of a helping hand, I presume? Might the Wood Wailers be of assistance?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_053<tab>Ihr klingt aufgeregt, ist etwas passiert? Wenn es in unserer Macht steht, ist das Klageregiment gerne bereit ...

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_054<tab>Ah! Well, if it isn't the adventurer! What brings you to this neck of the woods?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_054<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Du<var 1A 01 /var> ...?! Was hat dich denn hierher verschlagen?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is another one of your friends, I take it?
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_056<tab>So, in essence, a botched invocation rendered this thing unconscious? The solution to that is simple enough. Just leave it there to rest until it wakes up.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_056<tab>Soso ... Einer eurer Tricks ging also daneben und jetzt ist die Gute bewusstlos<var 1D /var>... Dann lasst sie doch einfach hier liegen, bis sie wieder zu sich kommt.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_057<tab>Thing!? <var 1A 02 /var>Thing<var 1A 01 /var>!? How dare you speak of Setoto in such a callous manner! And to think that you would suggest we leave this beautiful young lady out <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var> in the open until she wakes up─you must be mad!
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_057<tab>Was ist denn in dich gefahren? So springt man doch nicht mit einer jungen Dame um!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_058<tab>Young lady...? You're quite sure that's what he─er, she is?

TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_059<tab>Ahem. My apologies. I shall carry the young girl inside and see that she is given a proper place to rest. But before that... This...coat of green mucus isn't contagious, is it?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_059<tab>Also gut, ich stelle euch ein Zelt zur Verfügung, damit wir das Elend verstecken können. Aber wehe, da klebt mir nachher grüner Schleim dran!

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_060<tab>Green mucus!? That's not green mucus, it's... <sigh> Never mind.
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_061<tab>No, it's not contagious. You should be fine. Thank you for your help, sir. It is greatly appreciated.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_061<tab>Na egal, ein Zelt würde uns sehr weiterhelfen. Schlägt wohl doch ein Herz hinter dieser rauen Schale, was?

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_062<tab>At least for now, we can rest easy knowing that Setoto is safe─or as safe as she can be given the circumstances.
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_063<tab>All should be in order. I've seen to it that your friend has been given a comfortable bed to rest in until she recovers.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_063<tab>Um die grüne Schreckschraube kümmere ich, Landenel, Hauptmann des Klageregiments, mich höchst<var 16 /var>persön<var 16 /var>lich. Du brauchst dir also keine Sorgen zu machen, <var 08 E905 ((Abenteurerin)) ((Abenteurer)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_064<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I shall return to Bronze Lake and inform Surito Carito of all that has happened. Perhaps he will be able to shed light on what is wrong with Setoto.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_064<tab>Ich werde Surito Carito später von diesem Vorfall unterrichten. Vielleicht hat er eine Idee, was zu tun ist.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_065<tab>In the meantime, I would ask that you remain near on hand and keep an eye on her. Don't worry. I shouldn't be away too long.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_065<tab>In der Zwischenzeit bleibt uns wohl nichts anderes, als zu warten und zu hoffen, dass Setoto wieder aufwacht.

source: TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_ALKAZOLKA_000_070<tab>
TEXT_JOBSCH650_02925_LANDENEL_000_080<tab>
